title: Footloose (1984) Kevin Bacon + Chris Penn (DVDrip,MULTISUBS)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0087277/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0087277/</a>

Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files:
Arabic, Bulgarian, Croatian (Hrvatski), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English (ordinary), English for the hearing impaired, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hungarian, Icelandic, Italian, Norwegian, Polish, Portugese, Romanian, Slovanian, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish

Classic with Kevin Bacon (then 26) as a good dancer in one of his first feature films. Also memorable for showing Chris Penn (then 22) as a young, fit man; Sean Penn's younger brother died in 2006. 

Widescreen 720x384, surprisingly good stereo sound for a 1984 production.
Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX player.

This is an improved rip of the torrent I uploaded in May 2008. The film turned out to be so popular that I thought it deserves a better rip with all available subtitles. The old rip was just 528x304 pixels.
